targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  Timestamp AS "time",
  Temperature
FROM Weather
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and Device=3914926509
ORDER BY Timestamp

SELECT
  Timestamp AS "time",
  Temperature
FROM Weather
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and Device=8148852804
ORDER BY Timestamp

SELECT
  Timestamp AS "time",
  Temperature as Boutaresse
FROM Weather
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and Device=3914926509
ORDER BY Timestamp

SELECT
  Timestamp AS "time",
  Temperature as Guignies
FROM Weather
WHERE
  $__timeFilter(Timestamp) and Device=8148852804
ORDER BY Timestamp

SELECT 
    Windspeed*3.6 AS wind_speed, 
    Winddirection AS wind_direction
FROM Weather WHERE Device = 3914926509 and  $__timeFilter(Timestamp)
